pages.text: $(li)Blobfish are fishes that are located in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/deep_ocean)$(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/deep_ocean)Deep Oceans$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)They becomes pink if they are under less than 10 blocks of water pressure.$(br)$(li)They may drop a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/blobfish)Blobfish (Item)$(/l) on death.$(br)$(li)Blobfishes can be trapped inside of a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/water_bucket)Water Bucket$(/l).
